column2: except that I didn't get to try the baby backs
column3: and that's gotta be my test.  But everything else we tried--the St. Louis ribs
column5: and the pulled pork sandwich--was great.  The barbecue sauces are awesome.  Both have a very zingy vinegar taste
column6: and I love that.  The sides were incredible as well:  mayonnaise-less slaw
column9: and cornbread.  None of it was bad.  In fact
column10: I liked far better than our other Chicago BBQ foray a year or so ago.  I can say without hesitation that we'll go back to Smoque
column11: and I had no idea I liked BBQ this much.
